title: Can't access to ESXi host from mRemoteNG
author: m0hossa
body_snippet:
Hi

I am trying to add ESXi host to access in web using HTTPs but it does not do anything. The version I am using is 1.77.3 (Build 1784).

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks

comments.author: Meph79
comments.snippet:
> what version of ESXi host?

I'm not the one reporting this problem but i have the same issue so does my collegues.. 
This is what i have tested:
Working fine with ESXi 7.0.3c
Does not work with ESXi 8.0.1 and 8.0.2

Im running mRemoteNG V 1.76.20.24615

I think it is not working since the new UI was introduced by Vmware... But not sure.. 
When loading the loginpage does not show up only a blank screen (with correct color background)

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet: Has anyone tried another (random) webpage to be added into mremoteNG?

comments.author: Meph79
comments.snippet:
> Has anyone tried another (random) webpage to be added into mremoteNG?

Yes. I use for example iLO 5 webpage to manage ProLiant servers, that works fine. 

ESXi pages look like this:

ESX 8.0.2:

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.3
